name: Lucas Gomes Leria
title: IT Technician - Database Student
summary: Professional with strong interest in Data Science and Data Analysis, with a background in Database Management, complemented by experience as an IT Technician. With a solid foundation in Python and SQL, I am ready to develop and implement Machine Learning models, explore Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions, and optimize data pipelines and ETL processes aimed at driving strategic decision-making. My proactivity, combined with a continuous pursuit of challenges and focus on execution, ensures constant learning and the delivery of measurable contributions to innovation and the success of data-driven teams.

projects.name: Microservices Structure - Docker and Python Microservices Architecture

projects.name: Signature Recognizer - Neural Network Signature Verification System
projects.description: Implementation of a signature similarity verification system using neural networks and Triplet Loss, focused on embeddings, biometric evaluation and the CEDAR dataset.
highlights: Deep learning model training with EfficientNet-B0 and Triplet Loss for signature verification
Processing and analysis of the challenging CEDAR dataset with genuine and forged signatures
Implementation of biometric evaluation metrics including ROC Curve and Equal Error Rate (EER)
Embedding generation and signature verification based on Euclidean distance
Complete pipeline from data preprocessing to model evaluation in Google Colab environment

projects.name: URL Shortener - Desktop Link Shortening Application
projects.description: A simple and efficient desktop application for shortening URLs, with history and data persistence in MongoDB, and a Flask redirect server.
highlights: Desktop GUI application using PyQt6 with intuitive interface for URL shortening
MongoDB integration for data persistence and link history management
Flask web server for handling URL redirections from shortened links
URL validation and robust backend logic for link generation and management
Complete solution combining desktop application with web server functionality

highlights: Complete MVC architecture implementation with separation of concerns
Advanced task management with 4 priority levels and status tracking
Recurring events system with automatic task generation for 90 days
Real-time statistical dashboard with interactive charts and productivity metrics
System notifications, backup functionality and data export capabilities

Google Sheets API integration for automatic data import and synchronization

what_im_looking_for: I am actively seeking opportunities to apply and expand my skills in Data Science, Machine Learning, Full-Stack Development and Software Engineering. With a strong foundation in Python, Java, JavaScript and modern web technologies, I am passionate about contributing to projects that involve complex problem solving, innovative AI applications, microservices architecture and development of robust, scalable systems. My experience spans from desktop applications to cloud-native solutions, demonstrating versatility across different technology stacks. I am particularly interested in roles that combine data analysis, AI/ML implementation and software development, with a focus on creating impactful solutions that drive business value and technological innovation.

goals: Become a specialist in Data Science and Machine Learning
Develop innovative AI solutions for real problems
Share knowledge with the developer community
Grow professionally in data-driven and technology-focused environments
